channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel pushes ahead with vast illegal settlement in heart of West Bank
item.description: Tender posted for construction of 3,401 homes in settlement designed to ‘bury idea of a Palestinian state’ Israel is moving to start construction on a...

item.title: US reportedly ready to support European-led post-ceasefire defence force for Ukraine – Europe live
item.description: Draft statement to be finalised at Paris meeting of ‘coalition of the willing’ and US delegation also reported to refer to binding commitments to prot...

item.title: Trump calls Venezuela strikes ‘amazing’ and ‘brilliant’ in remarks to House Republicans – live
item.description: US president calls the Caracas operation ‘brilliant tactically’ and ‘an incredible thing’ and says deposed leader Nicolás Maduro is a ‘violent guy’ Fr...

item.title: Doug LaMalfa, California Republican congressman, dies aged 65
item.description: LaMalfa’s death cuts the House Republican majority to 218-213, tightening GOP control for passing bills Doug LaMalfa, a California Republican who repr...

item.title: María Corina Machado vows to return to Venezuela and rejects rule of Maduro’s deputy
item.description: Opposition leader says her movement is ready to win a fair election and praises Trump for toppling the president Venezuela crisis – latest updates The...

item.title: European allies back Denmark over Trump's threat to annex Greenland
item.description: Donald Trump has refused to rule out using force to annex Greenland - a scenario that would spell the end of Nato, according to Denmark.

item.title: Trump claims US oil firms could be 'up and running' in Venezuela within 18 months
item.description: Trump is open about his ambitions for scaled-up US operations, but analysts say such plans would take time.

item.title: Man who tried to save mum and daughter could get posthumous award
item.description: Mark Ratcliffe died trying to save Sarah Keeling and her daughter, Grace, at Withernsea, say police.

item.title: Iran anti-government protests spread to majority of provinces, videos show
item.description: Videos show that unrest has spread to more than 50 towns and cities, including pro-government heartlands.

item.title: Elon Musk's X should deal with 'appalling' Grok AI deepfakes, government demands
item.description: Grok is being used to digitally remove women's clothing - something victims describe as "dehumanising".
